pydevops¶

pydevops is a tool, used to deploy an awesome develop and operation environment.

How to Install¶

You can install it with two ways.

Use pip to automatic install:

pip install pydevops

Clone this repository to your laptop:

cd $HOME
git clone https://github.com/crazy-canux/pydevops.git

Install all tools and config them follow the user guide.
